footer-disclaimer: This is an alpha version. This website is unfinished and subject to major changes. Join our discord for updates and discuss your ideas for the site.
are-you-sure-delete: Are you sure you want to delete
task-list-has-tasks: This task list has {n} task. Do you wish to delete this or merge the task into a different task list? | This task list has {n} tasks. Do you wish to delete these or merge the tasks into a different task list?
confirmation-delete-task: Are you sure you wish to delete the task '{0}' without completing it? Any subtasks will automatically be deleted. You will not receive any rewards for it.
complete-sub-task-confirmation: Completing this task also completes all sub tasks. Are you sure?
which-reward-type: How would you like to be rewarded for completing your tasks?
no-rewards: Nothing, just let me complete tasks.
character-reward: RPG Character (Gain experience and level up your character)
village-reward: Village (Grow your village through your tasks)
activate-or-new: Activate an old character or make a new one?
activate-or-new-village: Activate an old village or make a new one?
change-name-later: You can change the name later through your settings.
pick-example-tasks: To get you started, you can pick a few of these example tasks to directly put into your task lists.
confirm-delete-instance: Are you sure you wish to delete the {type} {name}?
automatically-logged-out: If successful, you will be automatically logged out. Please log in with your new password.
name: Name
title: Title
page-desc: On which page(s) did you encounter the bug?
bug-type-desc: What type of bug is it?
bug-image-link-desc: If you have a screenshot of the bug, please upload it on a site like imgur and post the link here.
bug-comment-desc: What can you tell us about the bug? What were you doing? What did you expect to happen? What actually happened?
bug-admin-comment-desc: Add a comment only admins can see
see-conversation-reporter: Showing conversation between reported user {reportedUser} and reporter.
end-ban-confirm: Are you sure you wish to end the suspension of this user?
automatically-end-ban-warning: You cannot set the ban length lower than the elapsed time. If you wish to end the ban, use the checkbox.
delete-notification-confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this notification?
group-public-checkbox-desc: If you check this box, other people can find, see, and join this group.
group-require-application-checkbox: Is an application needed to join this group?
group-require-application-checkbox-desc: If you check this box, an application is needed to join this public group. You can see a list of applications in the "Manage Group"-modal.
group-description-desc: How would you describe this group?
group-name-desc: How do you want to call this group?
delete-group-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the group {group}?
leave-group-confirm: Are you sure you want to leave the group {group}?
no-groups-found: No groups at this time. Join or make one!
confirm-kick-from-group: Are you sure you wish to kick {user}?
block-user-confirmation: Are you sure you wish to block {user}?
no-blocked-users: You have no users on your blocklist.
not-yet-done: Hold up, you're not quite done yet.
feedback-explanation: Do you have any feedback for us? Features you'd like to suggest, new ideas for content, opinions on the site overall? Please fill in this form and we'll contact you if we have any questions or remarks.
feedback-features: Do you have ideas for a new feature? Try to describe your idea as detailed as possible. What do you want it to do? Where would you like to see it? We can further discuss these ideas on our Discord.
feedback-accessibility: Do you have feedback regarding accessibility? Please describe the problem you are facing and what would help you in this matter. If you use any programs that provides accessibility but encounter problems on this website, please leave the name of the program as well.
confirmation-delete-message: Are you sure you want to delete this message?
no-messages: No messages found at this time. Maybe send a message to one of your friends first!
explanation-tasks: Create repeatable or one-off tasks to manage your to-do list. Create sub-tasks to divide your chore up in bite-sized chunks and keep a clear overview of your mission. You can use this to create order in your daily chores, discipline yourself into new habits or work towards a bigger goal.
explanation-reward: Choose between improving a character or growing a village and watch it grow with each task you complete. Want to reach a higher level with your character or reach a new level with your village? Be sure to finish your chores for the day and watch your reward grow. Can't decide between a character or a village? You can switch whenever you feel like it, without losing progress! Of course, if this doesn't interest you, there's an option to turn it off entirely and switch it on at your disposal.
explanation-reward-header: Grow your character or village by completing tasks
explanation-social: While you can use this app alone, it's much more fun with friends. Invite your friends and make your own group, where you can see each other's progress and motivate each other.
